metadata.instruction: CONVERT TO CARTESIAN FORM A + BI
metadata.explanation: Using Euler's formula: z = r·e^(iθ) = r(cos θ + i·sin θ). Here: 3(cos(\pi) + i·sin(\pi)) = 3(-1 + i·0) = -3.
